faq.subTitle: Get the full picture of how Offgrid lets you spend, move, and live -without permission.

0.title: How does Offgrid work without KYC?
0.answer: We don’t need your passport to know your payment is valid. Offgrid uses zero-knowledge proofs and advanced cryptography to verify transactions - without collecting or storing personal data. You load crypto, we convert and process it, and that’s it.

1.title: Which cryptocurrencies are supported?
1.answer: Literally everything, we will even accept shitcoins.

2.title: How do I add funds to my Offgrid card?
2.answer: Simple: deposit crypto directly from your wallet. Once it’s in, you can spend it instantly - no delays, no forms, no questions.

3.title: Where can I use my Offgrid card?
3.answer: Anywhere Visa is accepted - online, in stores, globally. If they take cards, they’ll take Offgrid.

4.title: What happens if a transaction gets declined?
4.answer: It’s rare - but if it happens, you’ll get an instant notification explaining why. Most issues are balance-related and can be resolved immediately by topping up or retrying.

5.title: Is there a mobile app and web interface?
5.answer: Yes. Full control on desktop or mobile: track spending, generate virtual cards, manage accounts, and view rewards - all without giving up your privacy.
